item.title: Redis
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about Redis ChatGPT answer: What is Redis and why is it used? How does Redis implement caching and how does it differ from other caching solutions? What are the different data structures supported by Redis and how are they used? How does Redis handle persistence and data backup? What are some of the common use cases for Redis in real-world applications? Explain User ask:
